summary:
Specialties: Designing and organizing International Study tours on innovation, QA and leadership in Education, Health and Social Care.

Tailor-made study abroad tours for universities in an intercontinental setting (Europe, North America, Asia)

Consultancy in the use of conferences and study tours in long term strategy.
Training and coaching in intercultural skills and opportunities.

Interim management in an international context.

profile_positions.description:
ExHEM – Experiences in Higher Education Management – was founded in 2001 in cooperation with Maastricht University, the Netherlands. The company specializes in organizing Academic Tours® (international study tours) and conferences. Actually we are  ‘Brokers in Experiences’.
Exhem is active in higher education, healthcare, and education.
We often initiate our Academic Tours® on current issues, but mostly we work with partners.
ExHEM's strength is tailor-made projects. We are convinced that there is lots of potential at the crossroads of content, methodology and implementation. We also realize that in this business you seldom get the opportunity to do things a second time, and we act accordingly.

ExHEM is based in Maastricht. From here we organize our Academic Tours® and conferences in many continents.

Visit our website at www.exhem.eu
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Senior advisor Executive Board Maastricht University.
		
•	Advising and researching strategic policy issues
•	External affairs (International visits (incoming and outgoing) at the Rectors’ office) 
•	Events manager.

Past performance:
•	Research into the effectiveness of internal procedures aiming at preventing scientific fraud at  Maastricht University (2011)
•	Academic Tour for Directors of Faculties and Services of Maastricht University to Universität Wien and Università Bocconi (Milano) (2010)
•	Academic Tour for Executive Board and Deans to Switzerland (ETH Zürich, EPFL Lausanne), 2009
•	Organization of conferences  on ‘’ European Labour Market for Academic Graduates (2009 and 2006) for Maastricht University in cooperation with the University of Warwick, UK  
•	Program of art-related academic lectures at TEFAF Art Fair Maastricht, March 2008
•	Promotional Tour Rector + Deans of Maastricht University to four Chinese universities   (September 2007)
•	Academic Tour on Innovation to Helsinki, Finland for Vice-Presidents of Dutch Research Universities (2006)
•	2nd conference ‘Integrating Content and Language in higher Education, Maastricht, the Netherlands (2006)
•	Academic Tour for Maastricht University Deans to Canada (McGill, Montreal, and Queens, Kingston), Hungary (CEU Budapest) and Germany (Universität Mannheim), 2006
•	Foundation work for a international strategic consortium with seven European universities, 2005-2007
•	Local organizer EUA (European University Association) conference 28-30 October 2004 ‘Research as a Key to a Europe of. Knowledge’, also official event during the Dutch EU-presidency; http://www.unimaas.nl/eua/index.htm
profile_positions.title: Senior policy advisor to the Executive Board
